name: tcl-lsp.nvim
description: TCL Language Server Protocol implementation for Neovim

scripts.format: prettier --write 'tests/**/*.js' 2>/dev/null || echo 'No JS files to format'
scripts.format:check: prettier --check 'tests/**/*.js' 2>/dev/null || echo 'No JS files to check'
scripts.lint: eslint 'tests/**/*.js' 2>/dev/null || echo 'No JS files to lint'
scripts.lint:fix: eslint --fix 'tests/**/*.js' 2>/dev/null || echo 'No JS files to fix'

author: Your Name
